summary: Page 56 (book page 76) captures continuation of section עה, then sections עו through פ. Structural issue: the OCR incorrectly creates a grouping_header 'פ. המשכים ומעריב לעבודת ה'.' that duplicates section פ's title. Some text issues including garbled text in section עז.

issues.description: The OCR creates a grouping_header with title 'פ. המשכים ומעריב לעבודת ה'.' then a section with number 'פ' and the same title. The image does NOT show a separate bold unnumbered grouping header here. Section פ is just a regular numbered section. The grouping_header should be removed.
issues.corrected_text: Remove this grouping_header - section פ is a regular section, not preceded by a grouping header

issues.description: OCR has 'כדי שלא יחסרו הבריות חיה מחקימו לכל מסיו בו על כן נותן לו' - the phrase 'חיה מחקימו לכל מסיו בו' appears to be garbled OCR. The image text is difficult to read but this phrase is clearly wrong.
issues.corrected_text: Garbled OCR - needs verification against original

issues.description: OCR has 'קוב"ה טפי ליה לחגריה גם בעוה"ז' - 'לחגריה' should be 'לאגריה' (Aramaic for 'his reward').
OCR text begins with 'מקור המצוה: אבל מי שעובד הקב"ה שלא ע"מ לק"פ'. The 'מקור המצוה:' label should have been stripped from the text (as is standard for makor paragraphs).
OCR has 'וחמץ את כוחו לזכך עצמו' - 'וחמץ' seems wrong. Likely 'וחימץ' or another reading.
